casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
John Lewis WRAY, Jr. No. 395P13-2 Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 16, 2017 Joseph E. Herrin, Special Deputy Attorney General, Mike Miller, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina. John L. Wray, Jr., for Wray, John Lewis (Jr.)

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Defendant on the 3rd of February 2017 in this matter for a writ of certiorari to review the order of the Superior Court, Cleveland County, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Superior Court of that County:

"Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 16th of March 2017."

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 3rd of February 2017 by Defendant to Proceed In Forma Pauperis:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 16th of March 2017."

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 3rd of February 2017 by Defendant to Appoint Counsel:

"Motion Dismissed as moot by order of the Court in conference, this the 16th of March 2017."
